00061 function myplot(h,t,tunit,var,varname,varunit,color,twindow)
00062 
00063 kmax = min([length(t),length(var)]);
00064 if(t(kmax)>twindow)
00065     taxismin = t(kmax) - twindow;
00066     taxismax = t(kmax);
00067 else
00068     taxismin = 0;
00069     taxismax = twindow;
00070 end
00071 set(h,'XData',t(1:kmax),'YData',var(1:kmax),'Color',color); 
00072 ax = axis; axis([taxismin taxismax ax(3) ax(4)]);
00073 xlabel(sprintf('t [%s]',tunit)); 
00074 ylabel(sprintf('%s [%s]',varname,varunit)); 
00075 
00076 return;
